rdf:Description.dc:title: Emergency preparedness for flood emergencies at dams : guideline 2003 guideline.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Environment.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: [Edmonton] : Alberta Environment, Regional Services, Water Management Operations, Regional Infrastructure Support, Dam Safety,
rdf:Description.dc:description: Alberta Government Library*This document is the planning model around which all emergency preparedness plans in the province are developed both for government and NGO's that own dams. Information on Emergency Preparedness plans for specific dams can be obtained by contacting Alberta Environment.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Dam failures
Emergency management
Floods
Dams
